LinesAnswers.name: initial
LinesAnswers.line: The mechanism is old and dirty, the wire is still sticking out. It wasn't used for years.

responses.response: Insert the wire into the top slot.
Insert the wire into the middle slot.
Insert the wire into the bottom slot.
Pull out the wire and inspect the button again.

LinesAnswers.name: onTheRightWay
LinesAnswers.line: The mechanism is old and dirty. It wasn't used for years. It sparkles now.

responses.response: Insert the wire into the top slot.
Insert the wire into the middle slot.
Insert the wire into the bottom slot.

LinesAnswers.name: fixedButton
LinesAnswers.line: The wire is connected. Emergency button gloves with red and you can here some sounds from it.

LinesAnswers.name: call
LinesAnswers.line: Railroad police department, junior lieutenant Bitvenko listening.

responses.response: Comrade lieutenant, here is a fraud in the car, he plays cards with people for money, hides the cards in his sleeve and threatens everyone.

LinesAnswers.name: answeredLeutenant
LinesAnswers.line: Fraudulent gambler, you say? We will punish him to the fullest extent of the law. Wait a minute ... (Sounds of a hanged-up phone are heard from the loudspeaker.)

LinesAnswers.name: allDone
LinesAnswers.line: Now the button is pressed in, it seems that nothing more can be done with it.
